unnormalised: Hey guys, rooftop solar subsidies sound good, right? Heard the MNRE might be increasing them. My cousin, Priya, in Chennai, installed hers last Diwali. She says it drastically reduced her electricity bill – almost Rs. 2000 less per month! Amazing, no? She's practically making money back now. Heard it’s even better in states like Rajasthan with more sun. Makes you wanna celebrate with some biryani! Let's all push for more affordable solar!
normalised: Hey guys, rooftop solar subsidies sound good, right? Heard the M N R E might be increasing them. My cousin, Priya, in Chennai, installed hers last Diwali. She says it drastically reduced her electricity bill – almost rupee two thousand less per month! Amazing, no? She's practically making money back now. Heard it's even better in states like Rajasthan with more sun. Makes you wanna celebrate with some biryani! Let's all push for more affordable solar!
